002943_test.captiont: person is doing hand circles with arms out
002943_test.text2: do the same wave with the right hand and don't move the left hand at all and keep the right hand raised all the time
002943_test.text4: keep the left hand fixed and rotate the right hand in the same direction

002681_test.captions: a person is waving with his right hand and then the left one.
002681_test.captiont: a man moves his right arm side to side than shakes his left hand and moves it side to side.
002681_test.text2: do the arm motion sooner and lower.
002681_test.text3: don't extend leg and don't turn left
002681_test.text4: do the motion to the left not forward
002681_test.text5: don't turn and make a small step back
002681_test.text6: shift body facing forward and take a step forward when lowering your arm

003007_test.captions: a person stands still, swinging their head around.
003007_test.captiont: a man puts both arms down and moves his head side to side and in a circular motion.
003007_test.text1: start by tilting head to the right and then rotate neck anticlockwise once
003007_test.text2: look straight ahead instead of down
003007_test.text4: keep looking in the same direction and don't move head
003007_test.text5: don't lean your head back as much

003026_test.captions: a person standing upright, arms at sides; their leans toward right then left two times, next they do two neck rolls in a counterclockwise direction.
003026_test.captiont: the man is moving his arms
003026_test.text1: first tilt neck on the left return to center then rotate anticlockwise from the left
003026_test.text2: don't look back and keep the head straight
003026_test.text3: don't lean your head down as much
003026_test.text5: don't lean your head and upper body so much forward

002649_test.captions: a person grabbed something and start dancing with someone
002649_test.captiont: the person is doing a fancy dance.
002649_test.text1: turn around after the first step to the right
002649_test.text4: don't lean your upper body and do the jumping jacks on the spot with the legs not in place
002649_test.text5: do the first sidestep later and keep head up
002649_test.text6: take a step to the left and start later

002072_test.captiont: a person walks in a clockwise direction, completing one and a half circles
002072_test.text1: turn on a more open arc
002072_test.text3: don't turn, stay in the same position and raise right hand
002072_test.text4: take a long left turn and don't step back
002072_test.text6: keep the left arm closer to the body and walk faster

002074_test.captions: the man is walking around in circular motion
002074_test.captiont: a person walks in a counterclockwise circle twice
002074_test.text1: turn on a more open arc
002074_test.text3: take the first step with the right leg not the left and keep the right hand more straight and keep it lower
002074_test.text4: do longer steps and look forward
002074_test.text5: keep hands lower and turn wider.
002074_test.text6: walk with more energy and take a more closed turn

004538_test.captions: a person lifts both arms and claps his hands together and then repeats the action several times.
004538_test.captiont: a person holds their hands up to their face shaking slightly, as if crying.
004538_test.text1: not clapping just right hand to face
004538_test.text2: look more up and spread legs a bit wider
004538_test.text3: start with arms spread to the sides and bring them together
004538_test.text6: move the hands up and down with the palms facing each other

001466_test.captions: moving the hands and work some thing.
001466_test.captiont: a man is playing a violin.
001466_test.text2: keep your palm facing away and do the motion only once
001466_test.text3: start with both arms extended to the front, not with the right arm
001466_test.text5: do it slower and raise your arms higher
001466_test.text6: keep hands lower when they are out in front of body

001431_test.captions: a man stomps his left leg.
001431_test.captiont: the person is stomping with the right foot.
001431_test.text2: don't lift your left leg and don't step to the side
001431_test.text3: dont move the right leg instead keep it in the same position
001431_test.text4: don't step back and kick once with the right foot

001218_test.captions: a person runs forward while holding their right arm steady, then they turn around and run back while holding their left arm steady.
001218_test.captiont: a person walks forward then turns around and takes long jumps.
001218_test.text1: take a jump at the end
001218_test.text2: don't look back at the end instead look forward and continue to do the same action
001218_test.text3: turn right faster and keep the right arm on the side
001218_test.text4: take a smaller step back and don't bend down
001218_test.text5: jump slightly later and extend right arm forward while doing so
001218_test.text6: do a step forward before turning around

003576_test.captions: someone crouches, bending their knees and their hands meeting in front of them continuously.
003576_test.captiont: person squats and jumps out moving to the sides.
003576_test.text1: instead of squatting on the spot shifting to the right
003576_test.text3: begin by standing and then squat down and slide to the right
003576_test.text4: keep both knees bent when crouching and stand up earlier
003576_test.text6: begin the motion by already being in a half-squat position, then stand up at the end

003863_test.captions: this person has his hands in front as if to direct a crowd.
003863_test.captiont: a person raises both hands out in front of them and then makes various motions.
003863_test.text1: don't move the upright hands left and right just keep them straight
003863_test.text2: do the hand motion faster and higher
003863_test.text3: move the hands up and down instead of sideways
003863_test.text5: do a milling motion with arms instead of just raising arms
003863_test.text6: start by having your arms higher

003795_test.captions: a person crawls forwards on their hands and knees, turns around, then stands up and faces left.
003795_test.captiont: someone crouches and crawls and goes around
003795_test.text3: turn back a bit later and keep crawling in the forward direction instead of turning back

003842_test.captions: a person kneels down and gets on all-fours, possibly looking for something on the ground.
003842_test.captiont: someone crouches and crawls and goes around
003842_test.text1: take turn right after moving forward once
003842_test.text3: crawl a little further before turning back
003842_test.text5: bend more the elbows and knees and touch the knees to the ground and also touch the chest to the ground
003842_test.text6: keep crawling in the same direction without getting up

002084_test.captions: a person walks in a clockwise circle.
002084_test.captiont: a person walks in a small clockwise circle twice.
002084_test.text1: turn on a more closed arc
002084_test.text5: don't walk ahead take a u turn
002084_test.text6: keep the hands on the sides and bring them in front at the end

003497_test.captions: a person sits down and crosses its legs, then gets back up.
003497_test.captiont: a figure backs up and sits down.
003497_test.text1: keep the legs straight instead of crossing the left leg on the right one
003497_test.text2: keep hands closer to the body
003497_test.text4: don't keep the left leg on the right one after standing up
003497_test.text5: raise the left leg and right leg in turn instead of keeping them fixed in the air

001259_test.captions: a figure shakes itself a little loose then does squats with arms out forward
001259_test.captiont: a person squats down and holds out their arms
001259_test.text4: don't squat as deep, keep head up
001259_test.text5: bend more on the knees and keep the back straight
001259_test.text6: bend more on the knees and don't go back

002279_test.captions: a person stands with arms out partway to each side, lifts his right leg, swings it forward briefly, then sweeps it in a semicircle behind him before moving it forward and standing again; he then repeats the action.
002279_test.captiont: person is lifting his right knee.
002279_test.text2: do the motion only with your left leg, and make it in front of your body, not to the side
002279_test.text3: don't kick with left foot instead stay on the same position and rotate the upper body from left to right
002279_test.text4: don't move to the right and lift the right leg lower
002279_test.text5: raise right leg a bit more and look in the left back side
002279_test.text6: raise the leg a bit higher and rotate it counterclockwise

000883_test.captions: person gets on hands and knees, crawls forward, turns around, crawls back to where it started and stands up.
000883_test.captiont: a person bends down and crawls, turns and then gets up and walks back to where he started.
000883_test.text1: Turn at a 45 degree angle to the right keep head higher.
000883_test.text2: keep crawling forward instead of to the side
000883_test.text3: don't get up at the end
000883_test.text4: start with getting into the crawling position instead of already being in that position
000883_test.text5: crawl a bit faster and don't look back
000883_test.text6: don't get up at the end

000081_test.captions: a person walks backward and crouches down to crouch walk.
000081_test.captiont: a person sits down in a chair and then gets back up.
000081_test.text1: sit a bit higher taking one less step
000081_test.text2: walk three steps back before sitting
000081_test.text4: keep the left knee at the same level as the right one and get up at the end
000081_test.text6: don't get up at the end

003737_test.captions: a person sits down on the ground then stands back up
003737_test.captiont: person crosses legs and sits down on the floor, before getting back up.
003737_test.text2: Sit down on the floor with legs straight and then get up.
003737_test.text3: keep legs closer and look forward
003737_test.text4: bend more and start by crossing legs with left leg in front
003737_test.text5: don't start getting up at the end
003737_test.text6: bend down a bit more while sitting down

000052_test.captions: the person walks in a circle counter clock wise.
000052_test.captiont: a person walking in an anti-clockwise circular pattern
000052_test.text3: keep your head straight and do a smaller turn
000052_test.text4: step over the object instead of around it
000052_test.text5: take more steps and turn on a more closed arc
000052_test.text6: take a step forward before turning

002818_test.captions: this person is hoping around and kicking.
002818_test.captiont: someone tryiing to fight while moving his body
002818_test.text1: kick with the other leg towards the opposite side
002818_test.text2: kick in the opposite direction with the opposite leg and look straight
002818_test.text3: kick from a higher position and don't turn to the side
002818_test.text4: don't rotate the left and do a roundhouse kick to the left
002818_test.text5: kick in the opposite direction and don't turn around
002818_test.text6: don't go back and face left kick with left foot first

001468_test.captions: a person jumps sideways to the left with both feet.
001468_test.captiont: the person is jumping over to the side.
001468_test.text5: do the jump to the left
001468_test.text6: jump on the same place don't go back

003829_test.captions: a person gets on the ground and crawls on the floor then turns around continues to crawl. then gets back up in standing position.
003829_test.captiont: user slowly bends to ground an crawls on the floor in a circle
003829_test.text3: start getting up a bit later
003829_test.text5: keep crawling a bit further before turning back
003829_test.text6: keep the crawling position and turn back at the end without getting up

006474_test.captions: this person has arms raised then lowers them to his sides.
006474_test.captiont: a man crouches and doesn't move
